name: Samosa (Eid Snack)
description: Crispy pastry triangles with spiced filling
ingredients: For dough: 3 cups flour, water, salt, oil
For filling: 500g beef, 2 onions, 2 potatoes, curry powder, chili, peas
instructions: Make dough with flour, salt, oil
Cook filling with meat and vegetables
cultural_notes: Popular Eid snack, served to guests
description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු පිරවුමක් සහිත රසට හැපෙන පේස්ට්‍රි ත්‍රිකෝණ
cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය Eid snack, අමුත්තන්ට සේවය කරයි
